action_list.description: System action for installing an application

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash

sudo yum update -y
sudo yum install epel-release -y
sudo yum install -y openvpn wget

wget -O /tmp/easyrsa https://github.com/OpenVPN/easy-rsa-old/archive/2.3.3.tar.gz
tar xfz /tmp/easyrsa

sudo mkdir /etc/openvpn/easy-rsa
sudo cp -rf easy-rsa-old-2.3.3/easy-rsa/2.0/* /etc/openvpn/easy-rsa
sudo chown centos /etc/openvpn/easy-rsa/

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create
